summary: A deterministic wrapper that applies standard TorchVision image transforms to dictionary‑based inputs containing PyTorch tensors, enabling seamless integration of torchvision operations within MONAI pipelines.
business_intent: Provide a convenient way to incorporate non‑randomized torchvision preprocessing steps into MONAI’s dictionary‑oriented workflow, allowing users to work directly with tensor data without needing separate conversion or random augmentation handling.
